Step-by-Step Guide

Learn how to create professional raffle tickets with our mobile app

Design Tool Interaction

Learn how to use the design tools with interactive examples

Main Toolbar

Tap to select
Double tap to show properties panel

Properties panel

Learning Reference: Modified UI for demonstration purposes.

Not the actual application interface.

ğŸ‘†

Select Elements

Tap any element to select it. Selected elements show resize handles.

Tip: Only one element can be selected at a time.

Tip: Tap again to deselect or select another element.

â†”ï¸

Move Elements

Drag any element to reposition it on the canvas.

Tip: Only the selected element can be moved.

â†”ï¸

Resize Elements

Drag any corner handle to resize.

Tip: Only the selected element can be resized.

âš™ï¸

Edit Properties

Adjust position, size, and other properties in the properties panel.

Tip: Double tap to edit element properties. The element get selected on open properties panel.
